collection: Activity Details: What demographic visits your venue?
card_description:
POPULAR VENUE HOURS
Shows the total number of check-ins received, broken down by hour. Identify what hours are most popular and consider holding promotional offers during these times to increase traffic.

collection: Executive Pulse: Activity at a glance
card_description:
FRIENDS
Shows a list of all your friends. Strive to keep short pending times on friend requests to show people you value their business.

collection: Executive Pulse: Activity at a glance
card_description:
GENDER BREAKDOWN
Shows the rate at which males visit or check-in at your venue. Make efforts to balance the male to female ratio to increase overall traffic to your venue.

collection: Executive Pulse: Activity at a glance
card_description:
RECENT VISITORS
Shows the people who have visited your venue most recently and notified that they have done so via Foursquare. Reach out to these people to show appreciation.

collection: Activity Details: What demographic visits your venue?
card_description:
GENDER RATIO
Shows the gender breakdown of all visitors to your venue. Change venue strategies to evenly distribute male and female visitors as necessary.

collection: Activity Details: What demographic visits your venue?
card_description:
AGE BREAKDOWN
Shows the age breakdown of all visitors to your venue. Target marketing to those age groups that will best enhance your venue's brand.

collection: Activity Details: What demographic visits your venue?
card_description:
TOP VISITORS BY TIPS
Shows how many tips your top visitors have given your venue. Reach out to top visitors and show appreciation for promoting your venue.

collection: Activity Details: What demographic visits your venue?
card_description:
SOCIAL SHARE BREAKDOWN
Shows the social platforms through which people are sharing venue visits. Promote your venue on the most popular social sites to improve exposure.

collection: Executive Pulse: Activity at a glance
card_description:
TOP VISITORS
Shows the people who have visited your venue the most. Reach out to top visitors to show appreciation and strengthen relationships.
